title: ISic001371. Christian funerary epitaph for Romanos(?) and Agathe
body:
1ἀγορασία [τόπου]
2παρὰ Χαρμ[ίδου]
3κὲ Σοφίας ἠ[γόρα-]
4σεν δὲ Ῥωμ[ανὸς]
5[σ]ὺν Ἀγάθῃ [γυνεκί]

l.3 reg., orig. κὲ

1ΑΓΟΡΑΣΙΑ[.....]
2ΠΑΡΑΧΑΡΜ[....]
3ΚΕΣΟΦΙΑΣΗ[....]
4ΣΕΝΔΕΡΩΜ[....]
5[.]ΥΝΑΓΑΘΗ[......]

l.3 reg., orig. κὲ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text as restored by Ferrua, after the transcription of Ferrara;
  • 1: Ferrara: ΑΤCΙΑCΙΑ
  • 3: Ferrara: ΚΕCΟΦΙΑCΙΙ
  • 4: Ferrar: CΕΝΔΕΡΩΛ

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Purchase of the burial place from Charmides and Sophia. Romanos purchased it together with his wife Agathe.

Italian translation

Acquisto del sepolcro da Carmide e Sofia: (lo) acquistò Romano con la moglie Agata. (trad. S. Agnello)

commentary

bibliography

    Ferrara 1829 383 no.15 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002005 14.0552 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072 Ferrua 1941 238 no.134 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001456 Agnello 1953 no.56 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002211
